title: Billionaire Paulson Sells Stake in Alaska-Focused Trilogy Metals
description: Billionaire hedge-fund manager John Paulson has sold his stake in Trilogy Metals Inc. after more than a decade as an investor in the Alaska-focused mining company, which recently secured US government backing.
content: Billionaire hedge-fund manager John Paulson has sold his stake in Trilogy Metals Inc. after more than a decade as an investor in the Alaska-focused mining company, which recently secured US government backing.
